methods.name: public static void register()
methods.comment: * Register for the messages we're interested in.

methods.name: public void onConnected()
methods.comment:
* Called when the DDM server connects.  The handler is allowed to
     * send messages to the server.

methods.name: public void onDisconnected()
methods.comment:
* Called when the DDM server disconnects.  Can be used to disable
     * periodic transmissions or clean up saved state.

methods.name: private Chunk handleHELO(Chunk request)
methods.comment:
* Handle introductory packet. This is called during JNI_CreateJavaVM
     * before frameworks native methods are registered, so be careful not
     * to call any APIs that depend on frameworks native code.

methods.name: private Chunk handleFEAT(Chunk request)
methods.comment: * Handle request for list of supported features.

methods.name: public static void sendWAIT(int reason)
methods.comment:
* Send up a WAIT chunk.  The only currently defined value for "reason"
     * is zero, which means "waiting for a debugger".
